comment: Anchor at the WSe2 A-exciton energy using Pop et al., Commun. Phys. 2023 (SI Fig. 1): A(E)=1-exp[-\alpha(E)d] with d=1 nm.
Anchor at the MoS2 A-exciton peak height read from Bernardi et al. (Grossman group), Nano Lett. 2013 (Fig. 1c).
Anchor at A-exciton peak absorbance reported for monolayer MoTe2 (Nano Lett. nl502557g; Fig. 2b right axis).
